item.title: Books
item.description: Books pack the biggest bang for your buck containing massive knowledge in a small package. Catapult yourself on your journey to sustainable wealth and financial independence.

item.title: Semper FI
item.description: There are 3 rules for building sustainable wealth and being financially independent: Earn money. Spend less than you earn. Invest the difference. Break the rules.
